Steps.Message: Update at 07:36 - We know the timeframe we estimated is now approaching. Our engineers are continuing their work to repair our underground network in the Essex Road area.  As our staff are working with live electricity, we need to wait until it is safe for them to stop, and contact us with an update. We are really sorry you have been impacted by this and we will provide a further update as soon as possible.

We became aware of a power cut at 19:53. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 07:36 - We know the timeframe we estimated is now approaching. Our engineers are continuing their work to repair our underground network in the Essex Road area.  As our staff are working with live electricity, we need to wait until it is safe for them to stop, and contact us with an update. We are really sorry you have been impacted by this and we will provide a further update as soon as possible.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
